text.value: Please make sure about danger signs, rechek again
You have reported following danger signs during PNC visit
Does the baby have high respiration rate? (>60/minutes)
Is there a fever and convulsion?
No movement or poor movement only after stimulation. ?
Pustules more than 10 or 1 big pustule size more than 1 mm ?
Is there a pus from umbilical or readness around the umbilical area ?
**Refer to new born baby to near health facility, if possible give accompany **
Currently there are no any danger signs. Counsel to mother about danger signs.
Thank you very much for visiting the health facility
Give advice and pressure to family members to go to the health institution for check-up.
Did the took the health facility as recommended?
कृपया, खतराका चिन्हहरु छ कि छैन भनि पुन : जांच गर्नुहोस् ।
तपाईले नवजात शिशुमा निम्न खतराका चिन्हहरु छन् भनि रिपोर्ट गर्नु भएको थियो
(श्वास दर गन्नु होस् ) चाडो - चाडो श्वास फेर्ने छ *? (>६०/ मिनेट)
सुति रहने, ब्युझाउन गार्हो हुने छ ?
शरिरमा १० ओटा साना पिप्सो वा १ ठुलो ( >१ मिमि) पिप्सो छ ?
नाभी बाट पिप आउने वा नाभी वरपर रातो भएको छ ?
हात र खुट्टाको पैताला पहेलो छ ?
**नवजात शिशुमा खतराका चिन्हहरु देखिएको ले तुरुन्तै नजिकको स्वास्थ्य संस्थामा लैजान सल्लाह दिनुहोस् । यदि सम्भव भए तपाई पनि संगै जानुहोस् ।**
हाल नवजात शिशुमा कुनै खतराका चिन्हहरु छैन ।नव जात शिशुमा के कस्ता खतरा चिन्हहरु हुन सक्कछन् भनि जानकारी दिनुहोस् ।
स्वास्थ्य संस्था गएर जाँच गर्नु भएकोमा धेरै धन्यबाद
स्वास्थ्य संस्था गएर जाँच गर्नको लागि घरका सदस्य लाई परामर्स र दबाब दिनुहोस् ।यसले गर्दा नवजात शिशुमा के कस्ता किसिमका खतरा हुनसक्छन जानकारी गराउनुहोस् ।
के लाई स्वास्थ्य संस्था लगेर जाँच गर्नु भएको छ ?

bind.calculate: if(selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_baby_fast_breathing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_chest_indrawing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_umblical_pus_or_redness , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_yellow_palms_feet , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_pustules_10_or_big , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_no_movement , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_fever_convulsion , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_refuse_breastfeeding , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_vomits_everything , 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_baby_fast_breathing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_chest_indrawing , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_umblical_pus_or_redness , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_yellow_palms_feet , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_pustules_10_or_big , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_no_movement , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_fever_convulsion , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_refuse_breastfeeding , 'yes') or selected( /pnc_danger_sign_follow_up_baby/danger_signs/profile_vomits_everything , 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')
